title: Indulgent Italy Coastal Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Spa Credit
description:
Nestled just off the sun-kissed seafront and surrounded by lush gardens, this enchanting hotel seamlessly blends tranquillity with sophistication in Milano Marittima, an enchanting resort town known for its upscale ambience and well-known beaches. Indulge like never before by the heated pool or stop by the onsite tennis court to play a match or two. 

Dolce Vita Spa is on hand for rejuvenating massages and personalised beauty treatments, complete with a sauna, steam room and emotional showers. End your days wining and dining at Panoramico Restaurant, where local treasures from the Batani family farm meet innovative international flavours, before retreating to your elegant abode by the sea.
offer_address: 16 Piazzale Torino, Milano Maritima, Emilia-Romagna 48015, Italy
